p: The rats were divided into six groups of five each. Group-I included normal rats; Group-II DCF treated rats (15 mg/kg); Group-III DCF treated rats co-administered with the standard drug (Silymarin 40 mg/kg); Group-IV DCF treated rats co-administered with EA (40 mg/kg); Group-V DCF treated rats co-administered with AQ extract (200 mg/kg) and Group-VI DCF treated rats co-administered with Eth extract (200 mg/kg). During experimental period all the rats were administered orally a single dose of the drugs or extracts or combinations thereof for 21 days.
